entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 11 this evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
